name: cat facts
description: Retrieve a random cat fact.
query_parameters: None
example_response: {"fact": "Cats have five toes on their front paws, but only four on the back ones.", "length": 74}

name: cat facts
description: Retrieve a random cat fact with a maximum length.
query_parameters: max_length (integer)
example_response: {"fact": "A group of cats is called a clowder.", "length": 34}

name: cat facts
description: Retrieve multiple cat facts.
query_parameters: limit (integer)
example_response: {"data": [{"fact": "Cats have five toes on their front paws, but only four on the back ones.", "length": 74}, {"fact": "A group of cats is called a clowder.", "length": 34}, {"fact": "Cats can rotate their ears 180 degrees.", "length": 42}], "current_page": 1, "last_page": 1, "per_page": 3, "total": 3}

name: cat facts
description: Retrieve a list of cat breeds.
query_parameters: limit (integer)

name: dog facts
description: Retrieve a random dog image.
query_parameters: None

name: dog facts
description: Retrieve multiple random dog images.
query_parameters: number (integer)

name: dog facts
description: Retrieve a random image of a specific breed.
query_parameters: breed (string)

name: jokes
description: Retrieve a random joke.
query_parameters: None
example_response: {"id": 1, "type": "general", "setup": "Why don't scientists trust atoms?", "punchline": "Because they make up everything."}

name: jokes
description: Retrieve a random joke.
query_parameters: None
example_response: {"id": 1, "type": "general", "setup": "Why don't scientists trust atoms?", "punchline": "Because they make up everything."}

name: jokes
description: Retrieve ten random jokes.
query_parameters: None
example_response: [{"id": 1, "type": "general", "setup": "Why don't scientists trust atoms?", "punchline": "Because they make up everything."}]

name: jokes
description: Retrieve a random joke of a specific type.
query_parameters: type (string)
example_response: {"id": 1, "type": "programming", "setup": "Why do programmers prefer dark mode?", "punchline": "Because light attracts bugs."}

name: age by name
description: Predicts age based on a given name.
query_parameters: name (string), country_id (optional, string)

name: gender by name
description: Predicts gender based on a given name.
query_parameters: name (string), country_id (optional, string), language_id (optional, string)

name: nationality by name
description: Predicts nationality based on a given name.
query_parameters: name (string), country_id (optional, string)

name: zip info
description: Provides location data for U.S. ZIP codes.
query_parameters: zip_code (string)
example_response: {"post code": "90210", "country": "United States", "country abbreviation": "US", "places": [{"place name": "Beverly Hills", "longitude": "-118.4065", "state": "California", "state abbreviation": "CA", "latitude": "34.0901"}]}

name: get public ip address
description: Returns the public IP address of the requester.
query_parameters: format (optional, string)

name: art institute of chicago
description: Access artwork data from the museum's collection.
query_parameters: limit (optional, integer), page (optional, integer), fields (optional, string)

name: open notify
description: Get the current location of the International Space Station.
query_parameters: None

name: lyrics.ovh
description: Fetch song lyrics by artist and title.
query_parameters: artist (string), title (string)
example_response: {"lyrics": "Look at the stars, look how they shine for you..."}

name: randomfox
description: Provides random images of foxes.
query_parameters: None

name: trivia api
description: Offers random trivia questions.
query_parameters: amount (optional, integer), category (optional, integer), difficulty (optional, string), type (optional, string)
example_response: {"response_code":0,"results":[{"category":"General Knowledge","question":"What is the capital of France?","correct_answer":"Paris"}]}

name: exchangerate-api
description: Provides current and historical exchange rates.
query_parameters: base (optional, string)

name: Google Search Results
description: Retrieve Google search results using SerpApi.
query_parameters: q (required, string), location (optional, string), google_domain (optional, string), gl (optional, string), hl (optional, string), safe (optional, string), num (optional, integer), start (optional, integer), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Image Search
description: Retrieve Google Images search results.
query_parameters: q (required, string), tbm=isch (required), api_key (required, string), gl (optional, string), hl (optional, string)

name: Google Location-Specific Search
description: Retrieve search results simulating queries from a given geographic location.
query_parameters: q (required, string), location (optional, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google News Search
description: Retrieve Google News search results (set tbm=nws).
query_parameters: q (required, string), tbm=nws (required), api_key (required, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), num (optional, integer), start (optional, integer)

name: Google Maps Search
description: Retrieve Google Maps search results from SerpApi.
query_parameters: q (optional, string), ll (optional, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), start (optional, integer), api_key (required, string)
example_response: {"search_metadata":{"status":"Success"}, "search_parameters":{"q":"Coffee","ll":"@40.7455096,-74.0083012,14z"}, "local_results":[{"title":"Grace Street Coffee & Desserts", "rating":4.5, "address":"17 W 32nd St, New York, NY 10001"}, ...]}

name: Google Maps Place (by place_id)
description: Retrieve a specific place's details on Google Maps using place_id from SerpApi.
query_parameters: place_id (required, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), api_key (required, string)
example_response: {"search_metadata": {"status": "Success"}, "place_results": {"title": "Grace Street Coffee & Desserts", "rating":4.5, "address":"17 W 32nd St, New York, NY 10001", "phone":"(917) 540-2776"}}

name: Google Jobs Search
description: Retrieve Google Jobs search results from SerpApi.
query_parameters: q (required, string), location (optional, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), lrad (optional, integer), ltype (optional, string), next_page_token (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Shopping Search
description: Retrieve Google Shopping search results from SerpApi.
query_parameters: q (required, string), location (optional, string), google_domain (optional, string), gl (optional, string), hl (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Walmart Basic Search
description: Retrieve Walmart search results from SerpApi using a query.
query_parameters: query (required, string), page (optional, integer), api_key (required, string)

name: Walmart Category Search
description: Retrieve Walmart search results by category ID instead of a query.
query_parameters: cat_id (required if no query, string), page (optional, integer), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Trends Interest Over Time
description: Retrieve 'Interest over time' data for a given query using SerpApi's Google Trends API.
query_parameters: q (required, string), date (optional, string), hl (optional, string), geo (optional, string), tz (optional, integer), gprop (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Trends Compared Breakdown by Region
description: Retrieve 'Compared breakdown by region' data for multiple queries.
query_parameters: q (required, multiple queries, comma-separated), data_type=GEO_MAP (required), geo (optional, string), region (optional, string), date (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Trends Interest by Region
description: Retrieve 'Interest by region' data for a single query.
query_parameters: q (required, single query), data_type=GEO_MAP_0 (required), geo (optional, string), region (optional, string), date (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Hotels Basic Search
description: Retrieve hotel listings by location and date range from SerpApi's Google Hotels API.
query_parameters: q (required, string), check_in_date (required, string), check_out_date (required, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), currency (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Vacation Rentals Search
description: Retrieve vacation rental listings instead of hotels by using vacation_rentals parameter.
query_parameters: q (required, string), check_in_date (required, string), check_out_date (required, string), vacation_rentals (optional, boolean), bedrooms (optional, integer), bathrooms (optional, integer), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Hotels Property Details
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific property by using property_token.
query_parameters: property_token (required, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Local Basic Search
description: Retrieve local business results by query from SerpApi's Google Local API.
query_parameters: q (required, string), location (optional, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), api_key (required, string)
example_response: {"search_metadata": {"status": "Success"}, "search_parameters": {"q": "coffee shops", "location":"New York,NY", "hl":"en", "gl":"us"}, "local_results":[{"title":"Grace Street Coffee & Desserts","rating":4.5,"address":"17 W 32nd St, New York, NY"}, ...]}

name: Google Finance Basic Search
description: Retrieve Google Finance data for a given ticker or search query from SerpApi.
query_parameters: q (required, string), hl (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Finance Currency Exchange
description: Retrieve exchange rate data for a currency pair.
query_parameters: q (required, string), hl (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Product Offers
description: Retrieve online sellers (offers) for a given product_id.
query_parameters: product_id (required), offers=1 (required), start/page (optional, integer), filter (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Product Specs
description: Retrieve detailed specifications for a given product_id.
query_parameters: product_id (required), specs=1 (required), hl (optional), gl (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Product Reviews
description: Retrieve reviews for a given product_id.
query_parameters: product_id (required), reviews=1 (required), filter (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Events Basic Search
description: Retrieve events based on a query (e.g., 'Events in Austin, TX').
query_parameters: q (required, string), hl (optional), gl (optional), location (optional), api_key (required)
example_response: {"search_metadata": {"status": "Success"}, "search_parameters": {"q": "Events in Austin TX", "hl":"en", "gl":"us", "location":"Austin,Texas,United States"}, "events_results":[{"title":"Austin City Limits Festival","date":"2024-10-10","venue":"Zilker Park","address":"2100 Barton Springs Rd, Austin, TX"}]}

name: Google Flights Round Trip Search
description: Retrieve round-trip flight results for specified departure, arrival, and dates.
query_parameters: departure_id (optional, string), arrival_id (optional, string), outbound_date (optional, YYYY-MM-DD), return_date (required for round trip, YYYY-MM-DD), type=1 (round trip), hl (optional), gl (optional), currency (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Flights One Way Search with Filters
description: Retrieve one-way flight results with filters like non-stop flights and max price.
query_parameters: departure_id (optional), arrival_id (optional), outbound_date (optional, YYYY-MM-DD), type=2 (one way), stops=1 (nonstop only), max_price=500, hl (optional), gl (optional), currency (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Flights Multi-city Search
description: Retrieve multi-city flight results by specifying multiple segments in multi_city_json.
query_parameters: type=3 (multi-city), multi_city_json (required, JSON string), hl (optional), gl (optional), currency (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Flights Including/Excluding Airlines
description: Retrieve flights results including or excluding specific airlines or alliances.
query_parameters: departure_id (optional), arrival_id (optional), outbound_date (optional), return_date (optional if round trip), type=1 (round trip, example), include_airlines=UA,ONEWORLD or exclude_airlines=UA, hl (optional), gl (optional), currency (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Flights Booking Options
description: Retrieve booking options for a selected flight itinerary using booking_token.
query_parameters: booking_token (required), api_key (required)

name: Google Lens Basic Search
description: Retrieve Google Lens results by providing an image URL.
query_parameters: url (required, string), hl (optional, string), country (optional, string), api_key (required, string)

name: Google Play Apps Query Search
description: Retrieve app listings from the Google Play Store by search query.
query_parameters: q (optional, string), hl (optional), gl (optional), api_key (required)
example_response: {"search_metadata": {"status":"Success"}, "search_parameters": {"q":"weather apps", "hl":"en", "gl":"us"}, "organic_results":[{"title":"Weather - The Weather Channel","developer":"The Weather Channel"}, ...]}

name: Google Play Category Search
description: Retrieve apps from a specific Google Play category (e.g. 'GAME_ACTION').
query_parameters: apps_category (optional, string), hl (optional), gl (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Reverse Image Basic Search
description: Retrieve Google reverse image search results by providing an image_url.
query_parameters: image_url (required, string), hl (optional), gl (optional), google_domain (optional), api_key (required)

name: Google Videos Basic Search
description: Retrieve video search results from Google Videos by query.
query_parameters: q (required, string), hl (optional), gl (optional), api_key (required)

name: YouTube Basic Search
description: Retrieve YouTube search results by providing a search_query.
query_parameters: search_query (required, string), hl (optional, string), gl (optional, string), api_key (required, string)
example_response: {"search_metadata": {"status":"Success"}, "search_parameters":{"search_query":"star wars","hl":"en","gl":"us"}, "video_results":[{"title":"Star Wars: A New Hope Official Trailer","link":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=...","channel":"Star Wars"}, ...]}

name: Yelp Basic Search
description: Retrieve Yelp search results by location and optional query.
query_parameters: find_loc (required, string), find_desc (optional, string), yelp_domain (optional), api_key (required)
example_response: {"search_metadata": {"status":"Success"}, "search_parameters":{"find_loc":"San Francisco, CA","find_desc":"pizza","yelp_domain":"yelp.com"}, "organic_results":[{"title":"Tony's Pizza Napoletana","rating":4.5,"address":"1570 Stockton St, San Francisco, CA 94133"}]}

name: Yelp Category Search
description: Retrieve Yelp results for a specific category (e.g. 'restaurants') by location.
query_parameters: find_loc (required), cflt (optional), api_key (required)
example_response: {"search_metadata": {"status":"Success"}, "search_parameters":{"find_loc":"Los Angeles, CA","cflt":"restaurants"}, "organic_results":[{"title":"Bestia","rating":4.0,"address":"2121 E 7th Pl, Los Angeles, CA 90021"}]}
